channel.title: The Dream Eclectic
channel.description: We're going to bring something a little different to the table. A little music..a little talk...And, hopefully, it will be a respite from the seriousness of the world around us. A chance to dream while awake.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Dreams are the bright creatures of poem and legend, who sport on earth in the night season, and melt away in the first beam of the sun, which lights grim care and stern reality on their daily pilgrimage through the world. ~ Charles Dickens, Nicholas Nickleby
channel.itunes:author: Angel
channel.itunes:summary: We're going to bring something a little different to the table. A little music..a little talk...And, hopefully, it will be a respite from the seriousness of the world around us. A chance to dream while awake.

item.title: The Dream Eclectic, Capsule 16
item.description: 1. Moments in Love (Reconstructed) - Art of Noise 2. Waterfall (Instrumental Mix) - Electric Light Orchestra 3. Brave New World - Jan Hammer 4. N.Y.C. Dharma - A Reminiscent Drive 5. Body Double - Pino Donaggio The theme of the dream is "Post-Turkey Coma!" As always, please leave your comments, questions and suggestions on my listener line, 206-984-2522
item.dc:creator: Angel
item.itunes:summary:
1. Moments in Love (Reconstructed) - Art of Noise 2. Waterfall (Instrumental Mix) - Electric Light Orchestra 3. Brave New World - Jan Hammer 4. N.Y.C. Dharma - A Reminiscent Drive 5. Body Double - Pino Donaggio
The theme of the dream is "Post-Turkey Coma!"
As always, please leave your comments, questions and suggestions on my listener line, 206-984-2522

item.title: The Dream Eclectic, Capsule 14
item.description: 1. Where Have They Gone - Harmonic 33 2. The Organist Entertains - Tindersticks 3. Greasy Spoon - Ak Momo 4. Women to Control - Ak Momo 5. Little Person - Jon Brion with vocals by Deanne Storey The theme of the dream is "Scrounging up some lounge!" As always, please leave your comments, questions and suggestions on my listener line, 206-984-2522
